name: Tabi Tabi Po Alpha 0.1
description:
In this short Indie game, you play as Hiro.  A young Filipino teen who signed up for an experiment in a sketchy research facility. 

Hello! I'm Jan, the creator of this game. Please do be kind in Judging the game as i did try my best in making it in a span of a month. Juggling this with school as an 8th grader isn't that easy but I did try my best in making it, thank you!
